Name: La Carmagnole des femmes au Luxembourg et ailleurs
Source/Collection: Lieder f√ºr Frauenchor mit Klavier- oder Akkordeonbegleitung
Notes: Part of a collection highlighting songs from the Women's Movement, including demands for equal rights and self-determination.
Long Description: A traditional song included in a collection that showcases the musical expression of the Women's Movement, featuring songs from various historical periods and countries that advocate for women's rights, equality, and self-determination.
Short Description: A traditional song for women's choir with piano or accordion accompaniment, part of a collection on the Women's Movement.
